description.value:
Elves were betrayed during the Gap and can be untrusting of others. These elves train to see through deceptions, and gain a +2 species bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.nBrYkGfNBJAHe0xJ]{Sense Motive} checks and saving throws against illusion spells. Once per day, they can roll a Sense Motive check twice and use the better result.

This replaces elven immunities.

Use @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.Item.UcZr3VMRQePGITI0]{Elven Skeptic (Sense Motive Double Roll)} for tracking usage of once per day ability.
